strapiPost.title: Four NWA Restaurants Make Yelp's Top 100 in 2021
strapiPost.content:
In December 2020, Yelp asked its loyal community to shout out their favorite restaurants and go-to hotspots. Yesterday, Yelp officially released it's Top 100 Places to Eat in 2021 and four NWA eateries made the cut!

  • Ranking highest on the list was Wright's Barbecue, coming in at No. 18. Located in Johnson, Wright's is best known for their mouthwatering brisket, fall-off-the-bone ribs, and burnt ends.
  • Havana Tropical Grill in Rogers was the second-highest ranking NWA restaurant on this list at No. 52. This little slice of Cuba will have you saying one word - empanadas.
  • Familiar, fast favorite Sushi House in Bentonville placed 81st, and Khana Indian Grill in Fayetteville closely followed in the 89th spot.
  • You can view the full list of Yelp's 100 HERE.
